english.segment1: Sweetness whispers nothings in my ear. Nothing is exactly what I hear. With a glaze she gazes into space. Is there nothing more?. There must be something more. I can see that beauty is more than skin. My infatuation leads me to sin. Give me vision past the epidermis girl. Is there nothing more?. There must be something more.
english.segment2: I find a want, I want a need, I need a deeper love. I find a want, I want a need, I need a deeper love.
english.segment3: Sweetness whispers nothings in my ear. Nothing is exactly what I hear. Give me vision past the epidermis girl. Is there nothing more?. There must be something more.
